articles.title: Ryder Cup 2023: Luke Donald named as Henrik Stenson's successor to captain Team Europe in Italy - Sky Sports
articles.description: Luke Donald has been confirmed as Henrik Stenson’s replacement to captain Europe’s 2023 Ryder Cup team in Italy.
articles.content:
Luke Donald has been confirmed as Henrik Stenson’s replacement to captain Europe’s 2023 Ryder Cup team in Italy.

articles.title: England victory celebrations: 'What comes after Europe? The world,' says Leah Williamson - The Telegraph
articles.description: England's triumphant Lionesses on Monday vowed to add next year's World Cup to their European crown as thousands of fans turned out to salute their achievements.
articles.content: Good morning and welcome to live coverage of the England women's football team's Euro 2022 victory parade. Rare, indeed, are the moments a nation's brow is raised collectively by sporting events: 196… [+2376 chars]

articles.author: The Jakarta Post
articles.title: WHO Europe expects more monkeypox-related deaths - The Jakarta Post - The Jakarta Post
articles.description: "With the continued spread of monkeypox in Europe, we will expect to see more deaths," Catherine Smallwood, Senior Emergency Officer at WHO Europe, said in a statement.
articles.content: The World Health Organization's European office said Saturday that more monkeypox-related deaths can be expected, following reports of the first fatalities outside Africa, while stressing that severe… [+2136 chars]
